column1: Smoque BBQ////Hands down the best in the COUNTRY.  I have had bbq and smoked food in Georgia
column5: and the Carolinas.. bar none these guys are the best.  The brisket is truely award winning and the Kansas city ribs should come with a trophy.  Mac and cheese has layers a flavor and the cobbler is even scrumptious.  Order ahead or expect to wait for this must see hidden treasure in Chicago.
